title: Ondřej Karafiát
text:
Ondřej Karafiát (born 1 December 1994) is a professional <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> currently playing for <a href="FK%20Mlad%C3%A1%20Boleslav">Mladá Boleslav</a> in the <a href="Czech%20First%20League">Czech First League</a> on loan from <a href="SK%20Slavia%20Prague">Slavia Prague</a>.
Career.
He made his senior league debut for <a href="FK%20Viktoria%20%C5%BDi%C5%BEkov">Viktoria Žižkov</a> on 3 August 2014 in a <a href="Czech%20National%20Football%20League">Czech National Football League</a> 2-1 home win against <a href="SK%20Sigma%20Olomouc">Olomouc</a>. He scored his first senior league goal on 11 September 2014 in a 4-0 home win against <a href="FK%20Kol%C3%ADn">Kolín</a>.
On 3 August 2020, he signed a four-year contract with <a href="SK%20Slavia%20Prague">Slavia Prague</a>.
